title: Widevine (OEMCrypto) Level1 is broken on latest stable sunfish build (RQ2A.210305.006)
content:
As the title says, latest update breaks oemcrypto Level1 support rendering streaming of DRM-protected HD content impossible.

Device has a locked bootloader with official OS installed.

Logcat fragment with wvcdm L1 initialization where oemcrypto fails: https://0bin.net/paste/SBbWByY3#RFgOn4XMCviHTN3uWkU7gYtz46NqxbbMlR6z81a4kHk

I can also provide full bugreport if needed.
